answers.answer: I dont know specifically. I know they checked for down syndrome and antibodies. May have to google it.

The doctors I went to was very good. I only had to have my blood drawn twice when I was pregnant. Once for my first appointment. And the second time was the glucose test to see if I had gestational diabetes. Other doctor places will take more blood and do more. But that's what I know from mines.

question: In your second trimester what type of blood work is done what are they looking for
title: Question
